mapper.insert: insert into prod (prod_id, prod_name, prod_reguser, prod_upduser, prod_category, prod_brand, prod_price, prod_qty, prod_image, company_code, wh_number, prod_remarks) values (#{prod_id}, #{prod_name}, #{prod_reguser}, #{prod_upduser}, #{prod_category}, #{prod_brand}, #{prod_price}, #{prod_qty}, #{prod_image}, #{company_code}, #{wh_number}, #{prod_remarks})
mapper.select: select *, date_format(prod_regdate, '%Y-%m-%d (%a) %H:%i') as formatted_regdate, date_format(prod_upddate, '%Y-%m-%d (%a) %H:%i') as formatted_upddate, prod_qty as current_qty, prod_image as current_image, wh_number as current_wh from prod where prod_id = #{prod_id} and prod_status != '02';
